string.value: White Baby Monkey Making a Mess of the Garden
#p9000074#, a boy monk at the #b#m950100000##k, seems to be worried about something. Talk to #b#p9000074##k.

#p9000074# says that recently, a growing number of #o9500385#s have been entering the temple to break things and loot items. He asks that you teach the #o9500385#s a lesson. Help #p9000074# by eliminating #r100 #o9500385#s#k. You can enter the Monkey Temple by talking to #b#p9000080##k. \n\n#o9500385##r #a105841##k

You helped #p9000074# by defeating 100 #o9500385#s. Although the #o9500385#s should remain quiet for now, they will probably return soon again to make another mess. Come back #bin 1 hour#k to lend your assistance.
Uh-oh, it got dirty again...what will I do now? Oh, hello teacher! What? You’re not a teacher? Well, we’re all teachers and students of life. Don’t you agree?
I apologize for the mess here. There are some that have been causing havoc inside the temple. I really wish that there was someone who would get rid of them.

What? You'll help? Thank you! The #o9500385#s are responsible for destroying and breaking things in the temple. They weren't like this before, but they've been acting very strange recently. It might be due to their fear of the tourists.
But still, I can't let them defile the temple! Can you please defeat #r100 #o9500385##ks? That should calm them down a bit.
The White Baby Monkeys live in the Monkey Temple. You can enter by talking to #b#p9000080##k.
That's unfortunate. Well, I better clean this mess up.
I was waiting for you. Did you teach those #o9500385#s a lesson? Thank you so much!
This should keep the #o9500385#s in line for awhile. But they are not the type to remain quiet. They will probably return to their crazy antics in about #b1 hour#k. Could you help me again then?
You haven't taken care of the #r#o9500385#s#k yet? Just fighting #r100#k of them should settle them down. Please talk to #b#p9000080##k to enter the Monkey Temple.
